title: Lightning Round Challenge
description: 2-minute rapid-fire challenge. Answer as many as you can!

easy.question: Is it legal for a man to marry his widow's sister?
easy.explanation: For a man to have a widow, he would need to be dead

easy.question: What is the capital of Delaware?
easy.explanation: Dover is the state capital of Delaware
